name: Tim Chambers
review: sinheungsa    new renaissance temple    the landscape  sights  and beauty draw in and  bring a beautiful calm to anyone   hikers will thrill in the miles of trails and scenery   the architecture is beautifully crafted and do well to honor buddha   a must see when visiting sokcho

name: Anil Katti
review: a great weekend getaway  good place to enjoy autumn colors  the place is really cool and serene  good for a quick treck to ulsanbawi also  it s plastic free and neat  you can reach here by public transport  there are restaurants and souvenir shops  you can spend a whole day  if planning for a trek  good to go in the morning  happy trekking

name: Ranjith Kumar
review: best place for your autumn season  you can visit before autumn starts to see elegance of forest and river side  there are some restaurants too  but don t expect much on quality and quantity  spend some time to reach biseondae   it takes about 1 hr to reach there  if you are fit and strong in climbing then visit geumganggul cave  plastic free environment  morning time would be good

name: Zara Mazhar-Elstub
review: we stayed at the temple for one night   it was a beautiful experience and definitely the highlight of our trip to korea  it was beyond anything we expected and so very special   we were given the opportunity to join prayers at night and at dawn with the monks  we stayed in a beautiful temple building with a super warm and cosy room  excellent way to relax and de stress  surrounded by nature  our highlight of the stay was meeting monk mu moon who spent some time teaching my husband and i meditation techniques  thank you so much for hosting us yoonji
